projects.title: Interactive Web Platform
projects.desc: Developed an engaging educational platform using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS to teach coding with real-time feedback and gamification elements.

projects.title: Portfolio Website Builder
projects.desc: Created a Laravel and Vue.js-powered portfolio builder, allowing users to create professional websites with customizable templates and dynamic content.

projects.title: E-commerce Dashboard
projects.desc: Built a scalable and user-friendly dashboard for e-commerce management, featuring advanced data visualizations and smooth navigation using Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS.
